concept.title: AWS Credentials
concept.shortdesc: When the pipeline writes aggregated statistics to Amazon Kinesis Streams, it must pass credentials to Amazon Web Services.

conbody.p: aggregated statisticsAWS credentialsAWS credentialsaggregated statisticsUse one of the following methods to pass AWS credentials:basically copied from Kinesis Producer, make same updates in both places.

dlentry.dd: When runs on an Amazon EC2 instance, you can use the AWS Management Console to configure an IAM role for the EC2 instance. uses the IAM instance profile credentials to automatically connect to AWS.
When you use IAM roles, you do not need to specify the Access Key ID and Secret Access Key properties when you configure statistics for the pipeline.
For more information about assigning an IAM role to an EC2 instance, see the Amazon EC2 documentation.
